channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How gaming can get back to balanced growth | The DeanBeat
item.description: This week, we had 42 sessions and 97 speakers at our GamesBeat Next 2024 event. Thank you all for coming and listening.

item.title: Don’t let the stock’s selloff fool you. Nvidia had a great week.
item.description: Big cloud companies aren’t backing down from their AI spending, which bodes well for Nvidia.

item.title: Runway goes 3D with new AI video camera controls for Gen-3 Alpha Turbo
item.description: Realistically puts creators and their viewers into a fully realized, seemingly 3D world — like they are on a real movie set or on location.

item.title: Oil prices lifted by report Iran may be planning another major strike on Israel
item.description: Oil futures finished higher on Friday, finding support after a news report that Iran may be planning another major strike on Israel.

item.title: Meta makes its MobileLLM open for researchers, posting full weights
item.description: Developers and researchers interested in testing MobileLLM can now access the models on Hugging Face, fully integrated with the Transformers library.
